comment: Mashed up 6 bananas and added them to pot after I turned the burner off.
Forgot to take o.g. reading so I'm using the predicted a placeholder. Should have been higher with the banana addition.
After 10 days I racked to secondary. Sanitized blender, pureed 14 bananas (ripe with lots of brown spots), and poured into 6.5 gallon carboy (extra space probably needed).
